short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Moto X3M Spooky Land Legends as a Chrome extension - Try it now!
short.es: ¡Juega Moto X3M Spooky Land Legends como una extensión de Chrome - ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.et: Mängi Moto X3M Spooky Land Legends Chrome'i laiendusena - Proovi kohe!
short.fi: Pelaa Moto X3M Spooky Land Legends Chrome-laajennuksena - Kokeile nyt!
short.fil: Maglaro ng Moto X3M Spooky Land Legends bilang isang Chrome extension - Subukan mo ngayon!
short.he,id: ¡Juega a Moto X3M Spooky Land Legends como una extensión de Chrome - ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.it: Gioca a Moto X3M Spooky Land Legends come estensione per Chrome - Provalo ora!
short.lv: Spēlē Moto X3M Spooky Land Legends kā Chrome paplašinājumu - Izmēģini tagad!
short.ms: Mainkan Moto X3M Spooky Land Legends sebagai sambungan Chrome - Cuba sekarang!
short.nl: Speel Moto X3M Spooky Land Legends als een Chrome-extensie - Probeer het nu!
short.no: Juega Moto X3M Spooky Land Legends como una extensión de Chrome - ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.ru: Играйте в Moto X3M Spooky Land Legends как расширение Chrome - Попробуйте сейчас!
short.sl: Igrajte Moto X3M Spooky Land Legends kot razširitev Chrome - Poskusite zdaj!
short.th: เล่น Moto X3M Spooky Land Legends ในฐานขยาย Chrome - ลองดูเลย!
short.tr: O Chrome uzantısı olarak Moto X3M Spooky Land Legends oyna - Şimdi dene!
short.vi: Chơi Moto X3M Spooky Land Legends dưới dạng tiện ích Chrome - Hãy thử ngay!
short.zh_CN: 立即在Chrome扩展中玩Moto X3M Spooky Land Legends！
short.zh_TW: 在 Chrome 擴充功能中玩 Moto X3M Spooky Land Legends - 立即嘗試！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🏍️ Moto X3M Spooky Land 👻
Rev up your engines and prepare for a hair-raising ride through Moto X3M's spine-chilling Spooky Land! 🎃
Race your motorbike through eerie obstacle courses filled with ghosts, ghouls, and gravity-defying stunts. Can you survive this haunted motorcycle adventure?

Features:
Spooktacular Halloween-themed levels 🦇
Tricky obstacles and fiendish traps 💀
Perform wild flips and tricks for bonus points 🔄
Vibrant, cartoon-style graphics with a spooky twist 🎨
Race against the clock to set high scores ⏱️
Challenging puzzles to test your skills 🧩

Dodge tombstones, leap over pumpkin patches, and weave through haunted forests as you aim for the fastest times. But beware - one wrong move could leave you in pieces!
Perfect for adrenaline junkies and Halloween enthusiasts alike. 🎢👹
Remember to explore more thrilling games in the top-left menu! 🎮
